videos.title: The untold truth about Cowichan Valley gravel riding
videos.description:
The day before the Belgian Waffle Ride BC, we did a shakeout ride on the Cowichan trail near Duncan BC. This is some of the best gravel riding we've done in British Columbia. The Kinsol Trestle is a spectacular feature on this ride and the rail trail makes for some amazing riding.

videos.title: Cowichan Crusher 2025: We Trained for Months… Then This Happened   4K
videos.description:
We’ve been training hard for one of the most stunning gravel races in British Columbia — the Cowichan Crusher. With its rugged backroads, forested climbs, and breathtaking lake views, this event has always been a favourite of ours. But just days before the big race, sickness hit.

In this video, we share our journey: from winter training and long gravel rides to the emotional rollercoaster of possibly missing our first gravel race of 2025. Whether we make it to the start line or not, this story is about more than racing — it's about the ups and downs of endurance cycling, resilience, and the realities of training in your 60s.

🚴‍♀️ Join us as we reflect on:

What makes the Cowichan Crusher such a spectacular event

Our prep rides across BC and Thailand

Coping with illness and tough race-day decisions

👉 Subscribe to follow our journey toward more gravel races and the Half Ironman later this year.

#CowichanCrusher #GravelRace2025 #CyclingOver60 #VancouverCycling #BCGravel #CyclingLife #GravelGrinding #CyclingCouple
